actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt from the tax on generation-skipping transfers certain transfers to grandchildren of siblings of the transferor.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the estate tax on generation-skipping transfers certain transfers to grandchildren of deceased siblings of the transferor.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt from the tax on generation-skipping transfers certain transfers to grandchildren of siblings of the transferor.
